TopicTitle: Any idea when the Service Migration will be completed? Store not Available.

Articles.Content:
The 1.0 release is not available for download from the KSP store - due to a "server Migration"

Any word on when this will be completed?
Please clear your DNS cache and browser cache, then it should work just fine ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I still have this problem. For some reason I have access to the forums (obviously) but store and the general site are still 'migrating'. Have cleared DNS cache and firefox cache, and have tried the same in chrome. Any suggestions?

Edit: And yes, I have tried turning it off and on again.

> 
> I still have this problem. For some reason I have access to the forums (obviously) but store and the general site are still 'migrating'. Have cleared DNS cache and firefox cache, and have tried the same in chrome. Any suggestions?
> Edit: And yes, I have tried turning it off and on again.

I had the same problem. Apparently my ISP cached the kerbalspaceprogram site or something like that. When I changed to google DNS 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4 it solved the problem.
thankyou my friend it worked. Were you by any chance a virgin media customer? I've had to do this before to make league of legends work because of a problem with virgin media on their end.

No I'm living in Denmark, with Telenor as my ISP.

Their pretty ok usually, no bandwith caps and you even get a static IP and can have a server at home.
Same problem here. Deleted Windows DNS cache, Firefox cache & Firefox dns cache. Still getting the migration message :/

One surefire of fixing it is to switch the DNS servers you're using to the ones operated by Google: [https://developers.google.com/speed/public-dns/docs/using](https://developers.google.com/speed/public-dns/docs/using)
